contentList.content: Slashing Resistance (Magic)
You have Resistance to Slashing Damage, and take half as much damage from Magical Slashing attacks.
Piercing Resistance (Magic)
You have Resistance to Piercing Damage, and take half as much damage from Magical Piercing attacks.

You have Resistance to Bludgeoning Damage, and take half as much damage from Magical Bludgeoning attacks.
